      • fromLotus

        <T extends Base,D extends lotus.domino.Base,P extends Base> T fromLotus(D lotus,
                                                                      FactorySchema<T,D,P> schema,
                                                                      P parent)
        Wraps the lotus object in the apropriate wrapper object
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic org.openntf.domino type (wrapper)
        D - the generic lotus.domino type (delegate)
        P - the generic org.openntf.domino type (parent)
        Parameters:
        lotus - the object to wrap
        schema - the schema that ensures type safeness
        parent - the parent element
        Returns:
        the wrapper

      • wrapColumnValues

        java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object> wrapColumnValues(java.util.Collection<?> values,
                                                  Session session)
        Wraps a collection of mixed objects in a Vector of apropriate objects. It ensures that Name/DateTime/DateRange objects are encapsulated correctly.
        Parameters:
        values - the objects to convert
        schema - the schema that ensures type safeness
        parent - the parent element
        Returns:
        a vector with wrapper-objects
